name: Battery Hunter
description:
on An Unknown Planet


A spaceship crash-lands, and a small yellow robot plummets to the ground.
It awakens and appears to be functioning properly, able to move around.
Seems like it's time to explore this land,
to see if it can find any other companions.

Linear Levels

Players must eliminate all enemies in each level to progress to the next.

Skill Utilization

Make good use of the energy collected from defeating enemies to take down stronger foes.

Weapon Swapping

Discover different types of weapons throughout the levels to further advance your progress.

Agile Evasion

Master the art of evasive maneuvers to effectively dodge enemy attacks.

Controller Support

Play with a keyboard and mouse or use a controller for a more immersive gaming experience.
